section.title: Creating a Custom Button Group
section.para: This procedure shows you how to create a custom button group.

procedure.title: To Create a Custom Button Group

step.para: From the Object Types tree, select the type of object you want to create the button group for.
Type in a Button Group Text and Button Group Hover Text, and select the Button Group Image you want to use.
If custom buttons have already been created, assign them to the button group. If not, see to create custom buttons.

formalpara.title: Result:
formalpara.para: The button group will show in the object type you added the button to.
